channel.title: Herald-Tribune (Custom RSS - Broad Article Grab)
channel.description: A personal RSS feed with broader article scraping from heraldtribune.com

item.title: Marni's sentimental guide to giving the past a presence in our homes
item.description: Over the years, I have earned the reputation as the stuff police. I am forever nagging you to purge, declutter, toss, donate, edit, dump, oust, clear, lighten up and let go. But today, sit down, I am going to sentimentally suggest that some old things you should keep.

item.title: NBA legend Shaq wants to retire to The Villages in Florida: Here's why
item.description: Retired NBA legend and former FloridianShaquille O’Neal, 53,wants to retire to Ocala, Florida, for an eye-opening reason: The rumors about The Villages that have circulated among Floridians for years.

item.title: Are there any Floridians still on 'Bachelor in Paradise' this season?
item.description: "Bachelor in Paradise"is back after a year-long hiatus, followingformer Bachelor Nation contestantsas they attempt a second (or third, or fourth) chance at finding their soulmate on national television.

item.title: Florida football CB cleared after May arrest
item.description: The State Attorney's office has decided not to press charges againstFlorida footballjunior cornerback Dijon Johnson after his May arrest on felony drug and weapons counts in Tampa

item.title: Florida federal judge wants reason to keep Haiti…
item.description: After a Texas-based company that helped evacuate people fromwar-torn Haitiin 2024 sued the state of Florida for nonpayment, a federal judge in Tallahassee wants to know why the case shouldn't be thrown out.
